General.Name: Taiwan Chelic Corp Ltd
General.Description: TAIWAN CHELIC Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of pneumatic and electric actuator automation components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers air source units; control valves; miniature, standard, stopper, dual rod, compact, slide table, guide, rod less, clamp, and rotary cylinders; grippers; electro-pneumatic regulators, digital flow switches, and electric cylinders; vacuum equipment; and fitting/auxiliary equipment. It also offers accessories, including shock absorbers, float joints, manually operated valves, silencers, pu tubes, sensor and pressure switches, and rotary joints; and swivel modules. The company's products are used in production facilities, inspection machines, packing machines, forming machines, repairmen equipment, and factory automation applications. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 21, Guifeng St., New Taipei City, Taiwan, 243092
